thread.title: Britain set to be WARMER than Southern Spain as hot Valentine’s Day ends UK’s cold snap with temperatures expected to hit a balmy 13C by Tuesday
thread.title_full: Britain set to be WARMER than Southern Spain as hot Valentine’s Day ends UK’s cold snap with temperatures expected to hit a balmy 13C by Tuesday

author: therbert
title: Britain set to be WARMER than Southern Spain as hot Valentine’s Day ends UK’s cold snap with temperatures expected to hit a balmy 13C by Tuesday
text:
Opinion FEBRUARY THE THAWTEENTH Britain set to be WARMER than Southern Spain as hot Valentine’s Day ends UK’s cold snap with temperatures expected to hit a balmy 13C by Tuesday 
Warm air pulled from the South means Britain will have higher temperatures than Barcelona Revealed By TESS DE LA MARE 12th February 2017, 4:11 am
